name: Racing Feathers
description:
This is a Bird Race Simulator, where you take to the skies, and race against the clock.

With some great bird-physics, this game will make you feel free as a bird.

Just click the remote to flap your wings, and tilt it to set your course.

You can race against the 'ghost' of your fastest time.

The game comes with a free course, and a single in app purchase will unlock the three other courses.
